channel.title: Corrupt-Specz 317 Pk'ing!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/n15utt.png[/img] Corrupt-Specz is a RuneScape Private Server, more based an older version of RuneScape. We are based merely on the vision of a pk'ing server -without all the spawning and self leveling!
[size=14pt][font=times new roman][b]Features[/b][/font][/size] 24/7 Hosted (VPS!) Great stability No dupes Webclient Unique features Economic with PK System Constant Updates Great Staff Team Great Donator Benefits Great Rushing System! (PvP Rushing + Multi-Barrage) Working skills! 3 Different Playing Modes (Normal, Hard, R-S Mode) Castle Wars All Proper Emotes Work (INCLUDING SKILLCAPES!) Perfect Combat Account Recovery No rollbacks Item dropping works properly All PvP Items and Armors. (Morrigans, Vesta, Statius, and Zuriels) 24/7 SUPPORT! Perfect PM'ing Pest control Duel Arena (with NO bugs!) Report Abuse System -With MUTING! Random Events Advanced Cooking - Pie's, Pizza's, Dough Pets Points - Slayer Points/Pking Points/Skiller Points + Reward Shops Quests Best Eating System (Effects, Drinks, Food) Sound System Spirit Shields (WITH PROPER EFFECTS) Quest Cape from completing ALL quest! (Cape self removes upon new quest) Full Clipping + Dancing Easy to Use and FUN TO PLAY Fight Pits Supports all major operating systems (Windows, Linux, Mac) FLAWLESS Staking System
[size=14pt][font=times new roman]PICTURES[/font][/size] [IMG]http://i1070.photobucket.com/albums/u496/kthillman/Corrupt-Specz/3.jpg[/img] item.title: Corrupt-Specz 317 Pk'ing!
item.dc:creator: @kthillman kthillman
item.description:
@kthillman wrote:

[center]
Corrupt-Specz is a RuneScape Private Server, more based an older version of RuneScape. We are based merely on the vision of a pk’ing server -without all the spawning and self leveling!

[size=14pt][font=times new roman]Features[/font][/size]
24/7 Hosted (VPS!)
Great stability
No dupes
Webclient
Unique features
Economic with PK System
Constant Updates
Great Staff Team
Great Donator Benefits
Great Rushing System! (PvP Rushing + Multi-Barrage)
Working skills!
3 Different Playing Modes (Normal, Hard, R-S Mode)
Castle Wars
All Proper Emotes Work (INCLUDING SKILLCAPES!)
Perfect Combat
Account Recovery
No rollbacks
Item dropping works properly
All PvP Items and Armors. (Morrigans, Vesta, Statius, and Zuriels)
24/7 SUPPORT!
Perfect PM’ing
Pest control
Duel Arena (with NO bugs!)
Report Abuse System -With MUTING!
Random Events
Advanced Cooking - Pie’s, Pizza’s, Dough
Pets
Points - Slayer Points/Pking Points/Skiller Points + Reward Shops
Quests
Best Eating System (Effects, Drinks, Food)
Sound System
Spirit Shields (WITH PROPER EFFECTS)
Quest Cape from completing ALL quest! (Cape self removes upon new quest)
Full Clipping + Dancing
Easy to Use and FUN TO PLAY
Fight Pits
Supports all major operating systems (Windows, Linux, Mac)
FLAWLESS Staking System

[size=14pt][font=times new roman]PICTURES[/font][/size]




























VIDEO [COMING SOON]

Website: CORRUPT-SPECZ.NET
[/center]
